title: STAR Interview Answer
description: Create compelling behavioral interview responses using the STAR method
author: Prompt Forge

fields.label: Interview Question
fields.placeholder: e.g., Tell me about a time when you had to work under pressure...
fields.helpText: Enter the exact behavioral question you're preparing for

fields.label: Target Position
fields.placeholder: e.g., Senior Software Engineer, Project Manager
fields.helpText: What role are you interviewing for?

fields.label: Situation
fields.placeholder: Describe the context and background of your example...
fields.helpText: Set the scene - where, when, who was involved?

fields.label: Task
fields.placeholder: What was your responsibility or what needed to be accomplished?
fields.helpText: What was your specific role or what needed to be done?

fields.label: Action
fields.placeholder: Describe the specific steps you took...
fields.helpText: What specific actions did YOU take? Be detailed and focus on your contributions

fields.label: Result
fields.placeholder: What was the outcome? Include metrics if possible...
fields.helpText: What happened as a result of your actions? Include quantifiable outcomes

fields.label: Key Skills to Highlight
fields.helpText: What specific skills or competencies should this story demonstrate?

fields.label: Additional Context
fields.placeholder: Any other relevant details or constraints...
fields.helpText: Any other information that might be relevant to your story?
